act_pit.actname: International Interests in Mobile Equipment (Aircraft Equipment) Act

change.changenote: Section 2 was enacted by 2011-12-2, effective April 1, 2013 (BC Reg 116/2013).
Section 3 (3) was added by 2011-12-3(3), effective April 1, 2013 (BC Reg 116/2013).
Sections 4 to 8 were enacted by 2011-12-4 to 8, effective April 1, 2013 (BC Reg 116/2013).
